channel.description: Recent content in count on c332030

item.title: 使用 count 查询 group by 后的数量返回 null
item.description: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTH_USER u LEFT JOIN AUTH_USER_ROLE_RELATION rr ON u.ID = rr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN AUTH_ROLE r ON rr.ROLE_ID = r.ID WHERE u.CREATOR_USER_ACCOUNT='shunde123' GROUP BY u.ID SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM AUTH_USER u LEFT JOIN AUTH_USER_ROLE_RELATION rr ON u.ID = rr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN AUTH_ROLE r ON rr.ROLE_ID = r.ID WHERE u.CREATOR_USER_ACCOUNT='shunde123' GROUP BY u.ID ) t;
